name: OCPIParkingType
description: Reflects the general type of the charge pointâ€™s location. May be used for user information.

enumValues.name: ALONG_MOTORWAY
enumValues.description: Location on a parking facility/rest area along a motorway, freeway, interstate, highway etc.

enumValues.name: PARKING_LOT
enumValues.description: A cleared area that is intended for parking vehicles, i.e. at supermarkets, bars, etc.

enumValues.name: ON_DRIVEWAY
enumValues.description: Location is on the driveway of a house/building.

enumValues.name: ON_STREET
enumValues.description: Parking in public space along a street.
